results.content:
The layout of the course seemed disorganized and without a clear logic as to the order of everything. This could be easily rectified with an overview at the onset that outlined each of the functions discussed and why they ordered as they are.

That aside, if you possess basic PHP and HTML knowledge, this isn't difficult to follow and provides a basic understanding of what MySQL can accomplish.
results.content_html:

results.content: I am half way through this course and am enjoying the course and learning new things.  The instructor has put a lot of thought into the course and it is well done and he explains things well. Some experience in PHP and obviously HTML would be helpful, but you can still understand the concepts by following the course. I took off one star because source code is not supplied and I like to have code I can follow along with, so I am typing it out.   I corresponded with the school and they are working on getting the source code.
